summary.problem_solved: Provides regex patterns, input validation handlers (change/paste), and form data extraction utilities to standardize form behavior.

external.name: xregexp
external.why_used: Advanced regex support for unicode categories.

exports.name: ValidationType
exports.description_one_line: Union type for supported validation modes.

exports.name: handleChange
exports.description_one_line: React ChangeEvent handler that sanitizes input based on data-validation attribute.

exports.name: handlePaste
exports.description_one_line: React PasteEvent handler that sanitizes pasted text.

exports.name: useValidation
exports.description_one_line: Hook to apply validation props to an input.

exports.name: getFormElementValue
exports.description_one_line: Gets the trimmed value of a form field by name.

exports.name: setFormElementValue
exports.description_one_line: Sets the value of a form field by name.

exports.name: durationToSeconds
exports.description_one_line: Converts DurationValues object to total seconds.

exports.name: secondsToDuration
exports.description_one_line: Converts total seconds to DurationValues object.

details.what_it_does: Reads the 'data-validation' attribute from the input and removes invalid characters using XRegExp replacement.

params.name: validationType
params.description: The type of validation to apply.

params.name: requireError
params.description: Custom error message for required fields.

returns.description: Props object containing onChange, onPaste, onInvalid, and data-validation.

details.what_it_does: Returns a set of props to spread onto an <input /> element to enable automatic validation behavior.
